plot: A writer's dead wife returns from the grave to haunt him, and he finds himself attracted to her "spiritual" sexuality.
title: Los muertos, la carne y el diablo
plot_es: A writer's dead wife returns from the grave to haunt him, and he finds himself attracted to her "spiritual" sexuality.
original_name: Los muertos, la carne y el diablo
plot_en: A writer's dead wife returns from the grave to haunt him, and he finds himself attracted to her "spiritual" sexuality.
